Class ServiceReferenceExtensions

Provides extension methods for adding service references to the Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection.

| Improve this Doc View Source

AddGrpcServiceReference<TClient>(IServiceCollection, String)

Adds a gRPC service reference. Configures a binding between the TClient type and a named with an address. The client name will be set to the type name of TClient.

Declaration
public static IHttpClientBuilder AddGrpcServiceReference<TClient>(this IServiceCollection services, string address)
    where TClient : class
Parameters
Type Name Description
Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection services

The Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection.
System.String address

The value to assign to the Grpc.Net.ClientFactory.GrpcClientFactoryOptions.Address property of the typed gRPC client's injected Grpc.Net.ClientFactory.GrpcClientFactoryOptions instance.
Returns
Type Description
Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IHttpClientBuilder

An Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IHttpClientBuilder that can be used to configure the client.
Type Parameters
Name Description
TClient

The type of the gRPC client. The type specified will be registered in the service collection as a transient service.
| Improve this Doc View Source

AddGrpcServiceReference<TClient>(IServiceCollection, String, String, HealthStatus)

Adds a gRPC service reference. Configures a binding between the TClient type and a named with an address and gRPC-based health check. The client name will be set to the type name of TClient.

Declaration
public static IHttpClientBuilder AddGrpcServiceReference<TClient>(this IServiceCollection services, string address, string healthCheckName, HealthStatus failureStatus)
    where TClient : class
Parameters
Type Name Description
Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection services

The Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection.
System.String address

The value to assign to the Grpc.Net.ClientFactory.GrpcClientFactoryOptions.Address property of the typed gRPC client's injected Grpc.Net.ClientFactory.GrpcClientFactoryOptions instance.
System.String healthCheckName

The health check name.
Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.HealthStatus failureStatus

The Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.HealthStatus that should be reported if the health check fails. Defaults to Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.HealthStatus.Unhealthy.
Returns
Type Description
Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IHttpClientBuilder

An Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IHttpClientBuilder that can be used to configure the client.
Type Parameters
Name Description
TClient

The type of the gRPC client. The type specified will be registered in the service collection as a transient service.
Remarks

Note that the gRPC service must be configured to use gRPC health checks. See https://learn.microsoft.com/aspnet/core/grpc/health-checks for more details.

| Improve this Doc View Source

AddHttpServiceReference<TClient>(IServiceCollection, String)

Adds an HTTP service reference. Configures a binding between the TClient type and a named with a base address. The client name will be set to the type name of TClient.

Declaration
public static IHttpClientBuilder AddHttpServiceReference<TClient>(this IServiceCollection services, string baseAddress)
    where TClient : class
Parameters
Type Name Description
Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection services

The Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection.
System.String baseAddress

The value to assign to the property of the typed client's injected instance.
Returns
Type Description
Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IHttpClientBuilder

Builder.
Type Parameters
Name Description
TClient

The type of the typed client. The type specified will be registered in the service collection as a transient service. See Microsoft.Extensions.Http.ITypedHttpClientFactory`1 for more details about authoring typed clients.
| Improve this Doc View Source

AddHttpServiceReference<TClient>(IServiceCollection, String, String, String, HealthStatus)

Adds an HTTP service reference. Configures a binding between the TClient type and a named with a base address and health check. The client name will be set to the type name of TClient.

Declaration
public static IHttpClientBuilder AddHttpServiceReference<TClient>(this IServiceCollection services, string baseAddress, string healthRelativePath, string healthCheckName, HealthStatus failureStatus)
    where TClient : class
Parameters
Type Name Description
Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection services

The Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection.
System.String baseAddress

The value to assign to the property of the typed client's injected instance.
System.String healthRelativePath

The relative path of the health check endpoint for this HTTP service.
System.String healthCheckName

The name for the health check. Defaults to "{typeof(TClient).Name}-health" if not provided.
Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.HealthStatus failureStatus

The Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.HealthStatus that should be reported if the health check fails. Defaults to Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.HealthStatus.Unhealthy.
Returns
Type Description
Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IHttpClientBuilder

An Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IHttpClientBuilder that can be used to configure the client.
Type Parameters
Name Description
TClient

The type of the typed client. The type specified will be registered in the service collection as a transient service. See Microsoft.Extensions.Http.ITypedHttpClientFactory`1 for more details about authoring typed clients.
